data.title: To Think Like God: Pythagoras and Parmenides. The Origins of Philosophy
data.meta_description: To Think Like God: Pythagoras and Parmenides. The Origins of Philosophy by Hermann, Arnold - ISBN 10: 1930972008 - ISBN 13: 9781930972001 - Parmenides Publishing - 2004 - Hardcover
data.text:
To Think Like God

Hermann, Arnold

Published by Parmenides Publishing, 2004

ISBN 10: 1930972008 / ISBN 13: 9781930972001

New / Hardcover

Quantity: 15 available

Condition: New. Focuses on the emergence of philosophy as a speculative science, tracing its origins to the Greek colonies of Southern Italy, from the late 6th century to mid-5th century BCE. In this book, special attention is paid to the sage Pythagoras and his movement, the poet Xenophanes of Colophon, and the lawmaker Parmenides of Elea. Num Pages: 374 pages, 7 illus. BIC Classification: HP. Category: (G) General (US: Trade); (U) Tertiary Education (US: College). Dimension: 241 x 170 x 30. Weight in Grams: 936. . 2004. 1st. Hardcover. . . . . Seller Inventory # V9781930972001

Contact seller
